title: Issues logging into the PBE
body: Just made a PBE account a few days ago and I did file a ticket and haven't heard back. But all I get is 'Username or password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password, click here. Which i made sure my password was correct. Having it changed and also logging into the other league launcher with little issues. Care to help?

replies.body: Double check that you're using the right username as well. Most players needed to choose a new username that was different from their Live Account to use on the PBE servers. If you can't remember what you used, try hitting up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

It is indeed the correct username. I have sent you guys a ticket in response to not being able to sign in. Unfortunately the response I got from support was nothing helpful. They sent my email with a password reset. I didn't ask for a password reset. In fact if they had even read the ticket I told them that I reset my password and hoped that it would change. That didn't help. It's like my ticket was skimmed and thought it was a password problem.
